description: TZARC files are created every time you save your game in Trainz ( Save or Save As ). The archive is saved in the "backups" folder in the game installation directory. To locate your most recent save, sort the TZARC files in the folder by date. TZARC files can only be opened using the "Content Manager" in Trainz: A New Era and TZarchiver.
NOTE: Trainz was originally developed by Auran, which became N3V Games.
